title: The trials of Joan of Arc
itunes:title: The trials of Joan of Arc
itunes:subtitle: Historian Helen Castor discusses her new biography of the tragic French heroine Joan of Arc, describing her famous victories and the dramatic trial that condemned her to death. Putting the questions is fellow historian Dan Jones.  See aca...
description:
Historian Helen Castor discusses her new biography of the tragic French heroine Joan of Arc, describing her famous victories and the dramatic trial that condemned her to death. Putting the questions is fellow historian Dan Jones.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
Historian Helen Castor discusses her new biography of the tragic French heroine Joan of Arc, describing her famous victories and the dramatic trial that condemned her to death. Putting the questions is fellow historian Dan Jones.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
